remarks: Limit of the ratio of two converging sequences.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.)
statement:
climdivf.1 $e |- F/ k ph $.
climdivf.2 $e |- F/_ k F $.
climdivf.3 $e |- F/_ k G $.
climdivf.4 $e |- F/_ k H $.
climdivf.5 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
climdivf.6 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
climdivf.7 $e |- ( ph -> F ~~> A ) $.
climdivf.8 $e |- ( ph -> H e. X ) $.
climdivf.9 $e |- ( ph -> G ~~> B ) $.
climdivf.10 $e |- ( ph -> B =/= 0 ) $.
climdivf.11 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) e. CC ) $.
climdivf.12 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( G ` k ) e. ( CC \ { 0 } ) ) $.
climdivf.13 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( H ` k ) = ( ( F ` k ) / ( G ` k ) ) ) $.
climdivf $p |- ( ph -> H ~~> ( A / B ) ) $.
$d Z k $.
